nodes.text: The Jedi Grandmaster, Satele Shan, owned a double-bladed lightsaber during the Great Galactic War.

Satele Shan wielded her double-bladed lightsaber during the battle of Alderaan, injuring several Sith warriors along with damaging a Mark I Sith droid before entering a duel with the Sith Lord Darth Malgus. During the duel, it was cut in half by Malgus as he tried to kill Shan.
